text: Mata kare-ra wa `kore kore no kachiku to kokumotsu wa kinji rareru. Watashi-tachi ga yurusu mono no soto ni, dare mo taberu koto wa dekinai.' Nado to kare-ra no kattena ketsudan ni yori, senaka ga kinki ni natte iru ie 蓄 , Mata (tosatsu ni saishi) sore ni, arrā no gyomei o tonaenai kachiku nado to (netsuzō shite) iu. (Korera wa 凡Te) kare ni taisuru netsuzōdearu. Kare wa kono netsuzō ni terashi, yagate mukuwarerudearou
